Instance.description: A crafting recipe represents a tree of phases an actor progresses through to craft a particular product, as well as information about the product.

TuningRoot.Instance:
<Tunable type="int" name="crafted_by_text" class="TunableLocalizedString" default="0x0" display="Crafted By Text" description="Text that describes who made it, e.g. 'Made By: '. Loc parameter 0 is the Sim crafter." group="UI" />
<Tunable type="int" name="enabled" class="TunableLocalizedString" default="0x0" display="Enabled" description="Text that describes ingredients use to make it, e.g. 'Made with: '. Loc parameter 0 is the Ingredients List." group="General" />
